summary: Diff implements a functional file picker trigger, CSV parsing + validation, and UI wiring to import and display trades, and adds backend state/migration scaffolding for trade persistence. However, XLS/XLSX support is not implemented, and key backend acceptance criteria (import/list APIs, auth enforcement, audit logging) are not verifiable from the provided truncated backend diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Browse Files control must allow selecting CSV/XLSX/XLS files via native file picker.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend parsing utility explicitly rejects non-CSV files, so XLSX/XLS are not supported as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Support importing supported file types (CSV/XLSX/XLS) after selection, parsing on frontend, then submitting parsed trades to backend.
missing_requirements.reason: Import workflow appears implemented for CSV only; XLSX/XLS parsing is not present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a shared method to store imported trades (batch insert) and a query method to list trades.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided backend/main.mo excerpt shows new Trade type and tradeMap state but does not show any shared import/list methods in the truncated content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend enforces existing auth rules: only authenticated users can import trades; read-only users (Dealer) cannot import trades.
missing_requirements.reason: A helper isReadOnlyUser is added, but no import method or enforcement point is visible in the truncated backend diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: An audit entry is written for a successful import action including count of imported trades.
missing_requirements.reason: AuditEntry type and auditEntries state exist, but no visible code in the truncated backend diff shows an import action writing an audit entry.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new /how-to-use route and platform guide card.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest (scope is Trade Import upload/import/history only).

hallucinated_features.description: Added multiple "Download Sample" buttons/templates across Client Management, Margin, Bank Reconciliation pages.
Implemented/expanded Report Library, Report Wizard, and Scheduled Reports pages.
Added/expanded permissions matrix, roles normalization, and PermissionGate system-wide components.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested explicitly for this task (though it may exist already, the diff summary indicates changes/additions beyond Trade Import).
